content: heel in contrast yarn now the pattern is worked on the front of the sock do not break your main-coloured yarn only the back of the sock is worked in plain turn your work so the ws is facing you you stockinette charted and written instructions are now going to be working back and forth are on pages 4 5 and 6 on the next 30 34 38 sts the remaining 30 round 1 work row 1 of cable pattern for 34 38 sts are the front of the sock and will chosen size knit to end of round be left unworked for now row 1 ws sl1 p 29 33 37 2 wonderment socks by debbie ford row 2 rs sl1 k1 repeat across 30 34 38 repeat rounds 1 and 2 until you have sts decreased down to your original stitch count with 30 34 38 sts on the back of your sock repeat rounds 1 and 2 13 15 17 more times 14 16 18 in total k to m sm this is now your bor and you can remove the other st markers as you work the then work row 1 once more next round heel turn foot row 1 rs sl1 k 16 18 20 ssk k1 turn continue working in established pattern until row 2 ws sl1 p5 p2tog p1 turn the foot measures 4 cm / 2 inches less than desired foot length i recommend ending row 3 rs sl1 k to 1 st before your last turn having worked row 1 or 7 of the cable ssk using 1 st from each side of the gap k1 pattern turn if using contrast yarn for the toes break yarn row 4 ws s1 p to 1 st before your last turn here and start working with your contrast p2tog using 1 st from each side of the gap colour now p1 turn toe repeats row 3-4 until all stitches have been worked set up round k 30 34 38 pm k to end of round you will have 18 20 22 sts on your needle and the rs should be facing you round 1 k1 ssk k to 2 sts before marker k2tog sm k1 ssk k to 2 sts before end of gusset round k2tog 4 sts decreased now you are going to start working in the round 2 k to end of round round again repeat rounds 1 and 2 until you have 24 32 set up round this will be your bor place a 40 sts left marker if you wish k 18 20 22 pick up and k 14 16 18 sts along your heel flap break cut your working yarn leaving a tail of contrast yarn and start working with main approximately 38 cm 15 inches now you colour yarn here pick up 1 extra st in the can kitchener stitch your toe closed ladder from the row below and k tbl pm work row 8 of cable
